entry.title: Bitcoin Crashes to $57,000 and Ethereum Slips Below $3,000 Hours Before Fed Meeting
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum—and the rest of the market—are awash with red as investors expect more bad news from today's FOMC meeting.

entry.title: Musician FKA Twigs Tells Congress She Created Her Own AI Deepfake
entry.summary: Speaking before the U.S. Senate Judicial Committee, FKA Twigs shared her first-hand account of how AI could help or hurt artists.

entry.title: ‘I Will Do My Time’: Binance Founder Sets Sights on Life After Prison
entry.summary: Expressing thanks to his supporters, Changpeng “C.Z.” Zhao said education will be the focus of the next chapter of his life.

entry.title: This $2.8 Billion Coal Miner Has Been Mining Bitcoin, Too
entry.summary: Alliance Resource Partners now holds $25 million in BTC, which it earned with mining rigs first purchased in 2020.

entry.title: Gensler Lied to Congress About Ethereum, Says Rep. McHenry
entry.summary: The SEC has secretly considered ETH to be a security for over a year, according to a lawsuit by Consensys. McHenry says that’s a problem.

entry.title: AnimeCoin Launches ‘Gacha Grab’ Game With Ethereum NFT Collection Azuki
entry.summary: The AnimeCoin project, created by Azuki with multiple partners, has launched a gachapon-inspired game with collectible prizes.

entry.title: Hong Kong's Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs a 'Message From China': OSL CEO
entry.summary: After the first day of trading, the CEO of sub-custodian OSL reflects on what the Hong Kong Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs rollout really means.

entry.title: Crypto Market Sinks Amid Global Economic Uncertainty
entry.summary: The total crypto market cap is down nearly 5% today, with every Top 100 coin in the red.

entry.title: Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao Sentenced to 4 Months in Prison for Money Laundering Violations
entry.summary: The founder of Binance pleaded guilty last November to failing to establish a proper anti-money laundering program at the company.

entry.title: 'Bitcoin Jesus' Roger Ver Charged With $50 Million Tax Evasion
entry.summary: Early Bitcoin investor Roger Ver has been arrested and hit with tax evasion charges, the U.S. Department of Justice announced Tuesday.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Plunges to $60,000 as Crypto Liquidations Top $300 Million
entry.summary: Bitcoin hit $74,000 in March, but now is trading just above $60,000—as crypto liquidations in the past 24 hours hit $300 million.

entry.title: Bitcoin Is 'Only Crypto Asset' That Will Get SEC Approval for ETFs: Michael Saylor
entry.summary: MicroStrategy founder and chairman Michael Saylor suggests that Ethereum won't see the same kind of spot ETF approval that Bitcoin did.

entry.title: What Is the Bitcoin Genesis Block? How It All Started
entry.summary: The genesis block is the start of the immutable database that is the Bitcoin blockchain. Here's how it was created—and why it matters.

entry.title: We Do A Little With Mike Demarais
entry.summary: Mike dropped knowledge bombs from years of building in the trenches alongside some deep cuts on the early Williamsburg crypto mafia.

entry.title: Coinbase Plugs Into the Bitcoin Lightning Network
entry.summary: Users of the top crypto exchange can choose the alternate network for faster and cheaper transactions than the Bitcoin mainnet.

entry.title: Eth Rally Fails
entry.summary: Crypto falls, ETH/BTC rally again marks mini sell-off. Yen carry-trade implosion linked to worries. ETH gas fees hit 6-month lows. 3rd straight week of institutional outflows. Slowing BTC ETF flows are just a pause: Bernstein. BTC now on track for 5 red weeks in a row. BTC may have topped, could hit $35k: Brandt. ETFs may become big sellers: Bianco. Consensys list 4 reasons ETH isn’t a security. Rumours continue to grow of EigenLayer airdrop. Perp DEX volumes continue fall, GMX underperforms. Wallets begin to block US users after Samourai case. WLD in reported partnership talks with OpenAI. Large unlocks this week for SUI, PYTH & MEME.

entry.title: Gap Between Grayscale, BlackRock Bitcoin ETFs Narrows to $1.5 Billion
entry.summary: Grayscale and BlackRock are in a tight race for the top of the Bitcoin ETF table. The lead has halved in the past two weeks—but when will they flip?

entry.title: Hong Kong Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs See $11 Million Volume in Debut
entry.summary: It's a far cry from the debut of their Bitcoin ETFs counterparts in the U.S., which saw $4.5 billion on their first day of trading in January.

entry.title: Ethereum Price Dips to Weekly Low Amid SEC Security Uncertainty
entry.summary: The price of Ethereum dipped following revelations that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has privately considered it a security since 2023.

entry.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Preview: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: UPDATED: Magnetically attached Joy-Con controllers? Backwards compatibility? A huge 1080p screen? Here's the latest on the Nintendo Switch 2.

entry.title: Avalanche Hoops Game ‘Rumble Kong League’ Nets Gatorade Deal
entry.summary: Upcoming mobile basketball game Rumble Kong League will feature Gatorade-branded items.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Buys Even More Bitcoin, Pushing Stash to $13.5 Billion
entry.summary: Michael Saylor’s software firm MicroStrategy bought the dip, expanding its enormous pile of Bitcoin with more than 1% of the total supply in hand.

entry.title: New AI Model Reka Rises to Challenge ChatGPT, Claude and Llama-3—And It's Free
entry.summary: A lesser-known startup has produced a top-performing AI model, Reka Core. We put it to the test against its high-powered competition.

entry.title: Ethereum Restaking Protocol EigenLayer Reveals Token and Airdrop Plans
entry.summary: The Eigen Foundation will begin distributing EIGEN tokens on May 10, but US and VPN users will be blocked.

entry.title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Hits the Jackpot with $218,000 Block Reward
entry.summary: One miner's perseverance in the face of the dominance of centralized mining firms and major mining pools has paid off.

entry.title: 'Clash of Clans' Maker Supercell Invests in Crypto Gaming Startup
entry.summary: Blockchain startup Games for a Living has raised $3.2 million, with mobile gaming giant Supercell in the mix.

entry.title: North Korea's Lazarus Group Laundered $200M in Crypto, Says Blockchain Sleuth—Here's How
entry.summary: On-chain analyst ZachXBT has broken down exactly how North Korea’s notorious hacking group Lazarus laundered over $200 million into fiat.

entry.title: Bitcoin Rollups Could Boost Transaction Speeds 10X, Devs Claim
entry.summary: A new BitcoinOS whitepaper says its scaling system is resistant to government attackers.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Funds Bleed Investor Cash for Third Straight Week
entry.summary: Persistent outflows from Grayscale’s Bitcoin Trust overshadowed the modest gains of its peers.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Expected to Launch on Australia's ASX Exchange in 2024: Report
entry.summary: Approval of spot Bitcoin ETFs on the ASX exchange, which accounts for the bulk of Australia's equity trading, is reportedly near.

entry.title: Holograph Expands 'Omnichain' Gaming NFT Push With New Funding
entry.summary: With $3 million in fresh funding led by Mechanism Capital and Selini Capital, Holograph is pushing deeper into gaming with tokens that can be used across Ethereum-compatible chains.

entry.title: Bitcoin Token Runecoin Hits All-Time High Price Ahead of OKX Listing
entry.summary: Centralized exchange OKX is the latest to embrace Bitcoin Runes, running a Runecoin rewards drive ahead of the listing.

entry.title: Inside Sasha Stiles’ Experiential, AI-Infused NFT Drop with Bang & Olufsen
entry.summary: At a launch party for the collection in New York’s SoHo neighborhood, the artist broke down her latest art experiment, “Four Core Texts,” with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz.

entry.title: Interview: How 'Notcoin' Will Evolve After the NOT Token Launch
entry.summary: Open Builders founder Sasha Plotvinov speaks with Decrypt's Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai about how he envisions Notcoin's expansion and evolution after the token drop—into something akin to the "Netflix of social, viral games."

entry.title: Magic Runes
entry.summary: BTC stables at $66k, liquidations in narrow range. BTC funding again turns negative in bullish sign. ETFs net inflow after Grayscale moves to lower fees. BTC demand 5x vs supply post-halving: Bitfinex. SOL congestion issue now largely solved. Two SEC lawyers resign after ‘gross abuse of power’. Ripple fights to lower $2bn SEC fine. SAFE trades at $2.8bn FDV after OKX lists. MANEKI hits $150m on first day, China memes pump. Memecoins are ‘black hole you can’t ignore’. DeGods up 20%, may switch back to SOL. Magic Eden launches Runes platform ahead of time. Louis Vuitton gifts Pharrell jacket to NFT holders. Melania Trump launches necklace with SOL NFTs. Hoodie Punk trades for $620K.

entry.title: Luxury Watches, Designer Shoes Will Soon Trade Like NFTs: Arianee CEO
entry.summary: Arianee CEO Pierre-Nicolas Hurstel sat down with Rug Radio founder Farokh and Decrypt’s Sander Lutz at NFT Paris to discuss everything from the future of on-chain luxury to the secret hack to finding the best restaurants in France.

entry.title: Notcoin's Co-Creator Explains the Game's Token Delay—And When to Expect NOT Now
entry.summary: Notcoin co-creator Sasha Plotvinov spoke with Decrypt's Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai to discuss why the NOT token launch was pushed back from the original 4/20 target, when to expect the listing, and more.

entry.title: TON’s Justin Hyun Breaks Down The Importance of USDT Coming to Telegram
entry.summary: At Token 2049 in Dubai, The Open Network’s director of investments sat down with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz to discuss what he sees as the game-changing integration of USDT onto TON, and his plans for getting Telegram’s 900 million users to start using crypto in the immediate future.

entry.title: Crypto Influencer Ansem Explains His Meme Coin Thesis and Why He’s Bullish on Bitcoin Runes
entry.summary: Ansem, the crypto trader who's amassed a sizable following on the back of meme coin Dogwifhat (WIF) and other calls, chats with Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai about his meme coin thesis, why he's bullish on Bitcoin Runes, and what he sees ahead for the crypto markets.

entry.title: Decrypt's Sander Lutz Braves the Dubai Floods for a Crypto Conference
entry.summary: Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz reports from Dubai amid a historic storm that flooded the famed city, trudging through the streets to complete his essential task: Attending the Token 2049 crypto conference.

entry.title: Gold Beats Its All Time High
entry.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) maintains its trend of reaching higher lows amidst choppy market conditions. Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) witness another influx of $125 million. There's anticipation of Hong Kong approving ETFs for both Bitcoin and Ethereum (ETH) come Monday. Notable institutional investor BlackRock shows interest in Bitcoin. Recent filings reveal increased Bitcoin purchases by banks. A Bitcoin-friendly political party secures victory in the South Korean election. Analyst Kang predicts Bitcoin could surge to $80-100k by May. Meanwhile, Ethereum sees accumulation by stablecoin whales on the rise. A new Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP) aims to streamline signing requests. Solana (SOL) experiences a resurgence in activity, reaching yearly highs.

entry.title: NASA’s Next Deep Space Mission Won’t Use Artificial Intelligence
entry.summary: On Thursday, Decrypt Media visited NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory in Pasadena, CA to meet with the Engineering team behind the Europa Clipper before its launch to Jupiter's Europa moon in October.

entry.title: We Do A Little with Weesh
entry.summary: In this week’s episode, we did a little something different. We took the man who is usually behind the camera and put him in front of it. We sat down with our producer Weesh to dive into how in fell in love with art and became a collector, how he met Andy and fun childhood memories together, his biggest wins in crypto, and so much more.

entry.title: Inside VanEck’s Crypto Takeover of the New York Stock Exchange
entry.summary: Worlds collide as Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz heads to the floor of the NYSE to witness a special closing bell ceremony hosted by VanEck in honor of Web3. Featuring Choose Rich Nick, VanEck Head of Web3 Matt Bartlett, and more!

entry.title: Wormhole Wednesday
entry.summary: BTC hits $64.5K then rebounds, SOL outperforms. Government sends $2B BTC to Coinbase to sell. Funding rates stay low after sweep lower. ETFs see small inflow, Ark outflow more than GBTC. Wormhole W launches at $15B FDV. BTC ‘inflection point’ if it follows rates or gold. Gold & BTC very correlated for the last year. Expect slower ETF volume this month: Bloomberg. BTC 2x and 3x levered ETFs launch yesterday. BTC ETFs now half the size of gold.

entry.title: First Dogs, Now Cats
entry.summary: BTC falls another 6% amid $400m liquidations. ETF outflows and dollar strength blamed for move. Funding completely reset to lows in move. BTC lower high leaves market in ‘no trade zone’. This cycle acting ‘nothing like previous cycle’. ETH unlikely to be classed a security: Coinbase CFO. Crypto VC funding up 53% in MarchAnsem’s cat coin sees more volume than NFT market. Most memecoins down 10-20% given move in majors. MEW up 10% after HTX lists, airdrop to Saga phones. MEME to launch memecoin chain, NFTs rise. Pixelmon releases trailer for Anime series.
